bio.text: Hi, I'm Bilal Hassan, an Amazon Brand Manager who's spent the last 5+ years helping sellers turn their advertising from a cost drain into a revenue engine.

I started as a PPC Manager in 2020. Today, I've managed over $2M+ in ad spend across 150+ brands, consistently delivering results that move the needle: lower ACoS, higher organic rankings, and sustainable profitable growth.
My focus is simple: make your ads profitable, not just busy.
